mounted.title: Mounted
mounted.description: Equals true if the sensor is mounted.

dayMode.title: Day mode
dayMode.description: Equals true if day mode is active.

tempOutOfRange.title: Temperature out of range
tempOutOfRange.description: Equals true if the temperature out of range.

usAntimask.title: Ultrasound antimask
usAntimask.description: Equals true if an ultrasound antimask problem is detected.

irAntimask.title: Infrared antimask
irAntimask.description: Equals true if an infrared antimask problem is detected.

aacInactive.title: AAC inactivity
aacInactive.description: Equals true if a prolonged antimask problem is detected.

tooLongUnmounted.title: Too long unmounted
tooLongUnmounted.description: Equals true if the sensor is unmounted for too long.

smokeAlarm.title: Smoke alarm
smokeAlarm.description: Equals true if a smoke alarm has been detected.

batteryFault.title: Battery fault
batteryFault.description: Equals true if a battery fault has been detected.

hwSmokeFault.title: Hardware smoke fault
hwSmokeFault.description: Equals true if a hardware smoke fault has been detected.

foulingSmokeFault.title: Fouling smoke fault
foulingSmokeFault.description: Equals true if a fouling smoke fault has been detected.

hwUsAntimaskFault.title: Hardware ultrasound antimask fault
hwUsAntimaskFault.description: Equals true if a hardware ultrasound antimask fault has been detected.

hwIrAntimaskFault.title: Hardware infrared antimask fault
hwIrAntimaskFault.description: Equals true if a hardware infrared antimask fault has been detected.

aacFault.title: AAC fault
aacFault.description: Equals true if a aac fault has been detected.
